name: Minultimate Racing
description:
Minultimate is a 3D racing game where you race against other players using miniature vehicles, the game is a sim-cade and assets aren't final.

Id really appreciate it if you could leave some feedback on what you'd like changed and features to add.

Updates coming to game: 

-Multiplayer will support up to 8 max players

-Customization is a feature

-Cars are custom made
